original_text: Before you kill a murderer, people must agree that they saw him kill someone. But if only one person saw what happened, that is not enough for you to kill him.
korean_text: 사람을 죽인 모든 자 곧 살인한 자는 증인들의 말을 따라서 죽일 것이나 한 증인의 증거만 따라서 죽이지 말 것이요

sentences.original_text: people must agree that they saw him kill someone
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 그가 누군가를 죽이는 것을 보았다고 동의해야 합니다

sentences.original_text: But if only one person saw what happened
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 단 한 사람만 무슨 일이 있었는지 보았다면

sentences.original_text: that is not enough for you to kill him
